```{r import-libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(FactoMineR)
library(factoextra)
```

```{r}
df_nobel <- read.csv(
  "data/data_CA_NobelPrize_withMaths.csv", 
  sep=";", dec = ".", header=TRUE, check.names = FALSE, row.names = 1)
df_nobel

# colnames(df_nobel) <- c("Country", colnames(df_nobel)[2:ncol(df_nobel)])
# if you want to keep it in a column
```
```{r}
df_nobel %>% colMeans()
df_nobel %>% rowMeans()
```


```{r}
results_ca <- FactoMineR::CA(df_nobel)
```
```{r}
summary(results_ca)
```


```{r}
fviz_ca_biplot(results_ca, col.row="contrib", repel = TRUE) +
       theme_minimal()
```
